style: .sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-container{--sf-gutter-x:1rem;--sf-gutter-y:0;width:100%;padding-right:calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5);padding-left:calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5);margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-recomm-section{padding-bottom:50px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-container *{box-sizing:border-box}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-row{display:flex;flex-wrap:nowrap;margin-top:calc(-1 * var(--sf-gutter-y));margin-right:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x));margin-left:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x))}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-row>*{flex-shrink:0;max-width:100%;width:auto;padding-right:calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5);margin-top:var(--sf-gutter-y)}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col{flex:1 0 0%}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-1{flex:0 0 auto;width:8.33333333%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-2{flex:0 0 auto;width:16.66666667%}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-3{flex:0 0 auto;width:25%}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-4{flex:0 0 auto;width:33.33333333%;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-5{flex:0 0 auto;width:41.66666667%}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-6{flex:0 0 auto;width:50%}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-7{flex:0 0 auto;width:58.33333333%;margin-left:20px;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;display:flex}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-8{flex:0 0 auto;width:66.66666667%;}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-9{flex:0 0 auto;width:75%;margin-left:20px;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;display:flex}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-10{flex:0 0 auto;width:83.33333333%}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-11{flex:0 0 auto;width:91.66666667%;display:flex}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-12{flex:0 0 auto;width:100%}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-flex{display:flex}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-flex-column{flex-direction:column}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-align-center{align-items:center}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-list{max-width:440px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-list>.sf-product-item:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:32px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-image-container{position:relative;overflow:hidden;height:auto;cursor:pointer;box-sizing:border-box}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-widget-title{width:100%;margin-top:unset;line-height:1.5;text-align:center;font-weight:500;overflow-wrap:break-word;font-size:26px;font-family:unset;text-align:center;}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-image{transition:transform .3s ease-in-out;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0 auto;object-fit:cover}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-title{line-height:1.5;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:2;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;cursor:pointer;word-break:break-all}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-price-container{display:flex;flex-direction:column-reverse}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-price{color:#000;margin-bottom:5px;font-weight:600;}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-offer-price{color:red;margin-bottom:10px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-discount{display:none !important}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-fbt-add-to-cart-btn{display:flex;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:14px;width:55%;height:44px;border-radius:4px;min-height:40px;outline:0;padding:8px 8px;overflow-wrap:break-word;position:relative;text-align:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;min-width:40px;line-height:20px;color:#fff}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-total-price-container{padding:20px 0px;max-width:410px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-variants-dropdown{background-image:none!important;font-family:inherit;cursor:pointer;display:block;width:200px;height:32px;color:#000;border:1px solid;background:0 0;padding:0 18px 0 8px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;font-weight:400;font-size:12px;line-height:20px;box-sizing:none;border-color:#e9ebec;color:#232323;border-radius:6px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-cart-container{margin:15px 0 0}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-variants-dropdown option{padding:5px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-link{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;overflow:hidden}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-brand-container-list{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-start;margin-top:15px;margin-left:130px} .sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-item{position:relative;} .sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-item::after{content:"+";position:absolute;top:115%;right:45%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);font-size:20px;font-weight:500} .sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-product-item:last-child::after{display:none} .sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-brand-container-list a{text-decoration:none;color:#6d7175}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-brand-content{font-weight:500}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-cart-loading::after{content:"";width:16px;height:16px;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;margin-left:10px;border:4px solid transparent;border-top-color:#fff;border-radius:50%;animation:button-loading-spinner 1s ease infinite}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-original-price{font-size:80%;padding-left:5px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-discount-text{padding-bottom:20px;font-size:13px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-total-price{font-size:16px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-this-item{font-weight:600;margin-right:5px}.sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-checkbox-container{display:flex} @media (min-width: 375px) { .sf-product-cross-sell-list .sf-col-4 {  flex: 0 0 25%; } }
